settings.heading: Is everything you make eco-friendly?
settings.row_content:
We believe spending time outdoors makes everything better. Because we’re big fans of the
earth and all that it has to share with us, being eco-friendly is at the top of our priorities. Below is some info on the materials we use for various products:


Packaging

We use a certified home compostable alternative to a traditional poly bag. These come from a company called Better Packaging. Our mailers are made from 100% recycled content, 50% post-consumer content and come from a company called EcoEnclose.

Hangtags

We work with a company to print our materials with safe, eco-friendly dyes, and always use recycled paper.

Materials

Ripstop

Our ripstop is made of 86% recycled polyester (RPET) and 14% spandex.

Jersey/Compression

Our jersey is made of 87% recycled polyester (RPET) and 13% spandex.

Spandex

We’re looking into using recycled spandex in the near future as well. Our materials are Bluesign certified, which you can read more about here.
